sense.def: Alternative Writing re yong 熱壅 ; re yong 熱 擁. ① Pathological Condition of abundant heat in the interior associated with obstruction of the qi mechanism. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 6: 肺臟壅熱，心胸不利 , “When the lung is affected by obstruction heat , the heart and chest cannot function freely”.

②Natural disposition of pharmaceutical substances with a hot nature that are able, if consumed for an extended period of time, to generate congestion disease. Zheng lei ben cao 證類本草 Substance Entry xiao mai 小麥 quotes Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 : 麺…性擁熱，小動風氣 , “Flour: Its nature is one of obstructed heat . It slightly excites wind qi”.
